metadata.title: Top
metadata.description: LEAPS is an interactive web application developed to enable the design of high-performance protein sequences, even from a small amount of experimental data. It features a simple, user-friendly interface that requires no complex operations, making it accessible to anyone.

prompt.welcome:
Welcome to {name}.

LEAPS is an interactive web application developed to enable the design of high-performance protein sequences, even from a small amount of experimental data. It features a simple, user-friendly interface that requires no complex operations, making it accessible to anyone.
prompt.overview:
The following steps will guide you through the process:

Step 1. Dataset Upload
Upload a CSV file containing protein sequences and multiple experimental values for each sequence.

Step 2. Sample Generation
Based on the uploaded sequences, new sequences will be generated through shuffling or random mutation.

Step 3. Predictor Training
Train a prediction model for each experimental value.

Step 4. Screening
Evaluate the generated sequences using predicted values and likelihoods from the generative model, and filter them based on thresholds.

Step 5. Generative Model Fine-tuning
Fine-tune the generative model using the high-quality sequences selected through screening.

By repeating these steps, the system aims to generate optimal protein sequences tailored to your objectives.

step1.instruction:
Step 1: Dataset Upload
Please upload a CSV file.

Use the following format:
sequence,value1,value2,value3
Once the upload is complete, the next step will begin automatically.

dropzone.title: Upload File
dropzone.description: Drop your file here to upload.

email.instruction: Click the button below to complete your email verification. Please make sure to verify within 24 hours.
email.warning:
If you did not request this email, it may have been sent by mistake. Please ignore and delete this email.

The verification link is valid for 24 hours. If it expires, please request verification again.
